title.value: Influence of spring tillage and methods of sowing on fiber flax yield and soil fertility
Влияние систем весенней обработки и способов сева на урожайность льна-долгунца и плодородие почвы

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Kulmanov, O.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Flax

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results on the efficiency of systems of spring soil cultivation and sowing with different national single-operational aggregates and foreign tillage-sowing aggregate 'Amazone AD 303'. Their influence on fibre flax (Linum usitatissimum) productivity and soil fertility is shown. It has been established, that using of combined aggregate for fibre flax sowing improve physical and biological soil parameters. Research on the comparative effectiveness of different spring intensive and minimum tillage for flax using single-purpose national seeders SPU-4L, SZL-3,6 and the combined soil tillage and sowing aggregate 'Amazone AD 303' showed the superiority of the latter aggregate impact on crop productivity and indicators of physical and biological state of the arable layer. During the qualitative autumn soil tillage in the process of spring sowing of flax with the combined soil tillage and sowing aggregate 'Amazone AD 303'it is necessary to realize only one cultivation for 'closing the moisture'.
